StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateCollegePro.lePFTUsingGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CollegePro.lePFTID uniqueiden..er, @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int, @PullUpLoca.on varchar(100), @CrunchLoca.on varchar(100), @RunRoute varchar(80), @UserLogin varchar(50), @PushUpLoca.on varchar(100) = null
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @SchoolCodeint int
BEGIN TRANSACTION
Select @SchoolCodeint = School_Code FROM High_School hs where hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].[CollegePro.le] where CollegePro.leID = @CollegePro.leID and @CollegePro.leID IS NOT NULL)
BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] ([CollegePro.leID],[SCHOOL_CODE], [FiscalYear], [UserLogin], [UpdateDate]) VALUES (@CollegePro.leID,@SchoolCodeint,@FiscalYear, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].[CollegePro.lePFT] where CollegePro.lePFTID = @CollegePro.lePFTID and @CollegePro.lePFTID IS NOT NULL)
-- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.lePFT] SET
--Cannot update [CollegePro.leID] once it is inserted --[CollegePro.leID] = @CollegePro.leID
[PullUpLoca.on] = @PullUpLoca.on, [PushUpLoca.on] = @PushUpLoca.on, [CrunchLoca.on] = @CrunchLoca.on, [RunRoute] = @RunRoute, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin, [UpdateDate] = GetDate()
WHERE CollegePro.lePFTID = @CollegePro.lePFTID and @CollegePro.lePFTID IS NOT NULL END
--ELSE PROCEED WITH INSERT ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.lePFT] ([CollegePro.lePFTID],[CollegePro.leID], [PullUpLoca.on], [PushUpLoca.on], [CrunchLoca.on], [RunRoute],[UserLogin], [UpdateDate])
VALUES (@CollegePro.lePFTID,@CollegePro.leID, @PullUpLoca.on, @PushUpLoca.on, @CrunchLoca.on, @RunRoute, @UserLogin,GetDate())
END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
